text: (Avanu) pratiyobba jiviyu enella maduttiruvanendu sada melvicarane nadesuttiruvavanu. Istiddu avaru allahanige paludararannu aropisuttiddare. Heliri; nivu avara hesarugalannadaru tilisiri. Nivenu, bhumiyalli avanige (allahanige) tilide illada visayavondannu avanige tilisuttiruvira! Athava nivu kevala matina mattige (hage) heluttiruvira? Nijavagi dhikkarigala palige avara vancaneyannu candaganisi kodalagide mattu avarannu saridariyinda tadedidalagide. Yarannu allahanu darigedisidano avarige dari toraballavaru yaru illa
